com.wit.android.widget.adapter.module

Class BaseHeadersModule<H extends BaseHeadersModule.Header,Adapter extends AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.module.AdapterModule<Adapter>
      • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.module.BaseHeadersModule<H,Adapter>
  • Type Parameters:
    H - Type of header item provided by implementation of this headers module.
    Adapter - Type of the adapter for which can be this headers module created and used.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphabeticHeaders

    public abstract class BaseHeadersModule<H extends BaseHeadersModule.Header,Adapter extends AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter>
extends AdapterModule<Adapter>

    Class Overview

    Base implementation for an adapter modules which can provide headers data set for "header-based" adapters.

    • Method Detail

      • isHeaderAt

        public boolean isHeaderAt(int position)

        Checks whether there is header at the requested position or not.

        Parameters:
        position - Position in data set to check.
        Returns:
        True if there is a header item at the requested position, false otherwise.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()

        Checks whether this headers module has some headers or not.

        Returns:
        True if this module doesn't have any headers, false otherwise.

      • clearHeaders

        public void clearHeaders()

        Clears current headers data set of this headers module.

      • correctPosition

        public int correctPosition(int position)

        Corrects the given position passed from the related adapter. Position will be corrected by count of the headers counted by getHeadersCountBeforePosition(int).

        Parameters:
        position - Position to correct.
        Returns:
        Corrected position which can be used in the related adapter to access items from its data set.

      • createHeaderViewHolder

        public java.lang.Object createHeaderViewHolder(int position,
                                      android.view.View headerView)

        Called to create view holder for header item at the given position.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of the header item from the current headers data set.
        headerView - The header's view, for which should be holder created.
        Returns:
        The view holder for header's view at the specified position.

      • createHeaderView

        public android.view.View createHeaderView(int position,
                                 android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                 android.view.ViewGroup root)

        Called to crate view for header item at the given position.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of the header item from the current headers data set.
        inflater - Layout inflater for the current context.
        root - The parent to that will be this view eventually attached to.
        Returns:
        The view corresponding to header item at the specified position.

      • bindHeaderView

        public void bindHeaderView(int position,
                  java.lang.Object headerHolder)

        Called to bind header's view at the given position.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of the header item from the current headers data set.
        headerHolder - The header's view holder created by createHeaderViewHolder(int, android.view.View).

      • setHeaderStyleAttr

        public void setHeaderStyleAttr(int styleAttr)

        Sets an xml attribute which should contain style for the header view. See com.wit.android.widget.adapter.module.AlphabeticHeaders.HeaderHolder#createView(android.content.Context, int) for more information in which theme should be the given styleAttr placed.

        Parameters:
        styleAttr - An xml attribute to style the view for the header item provided by this headers module.
        See Also:
        getHeaderStyleAttr(), com.wit.android.widget.adapter.module.AlphabeticHeaders.HeaderHolder

      • getHeaderStyleAttr

        public int getHeaderStyleAttr()

        Returns the xml attribute set by setHeaderStyleAttr(int).

        Returns:
        Xml attribute.
        See Also:
        setHeaderStyleAttr(int)

      • getHeadersCountBeforePosition

        public int getHeadersCountBeforePosition(int position)

        Counts headers presented in the current headers data set before the requested position.

        Parameters:
        position - Position, to which should be headers counted.
        Returns:
        The count of headers before the requested position.

      • getHeader

        public H getHeader(int position)

        Returns header associated with the specified position from the current headers data set of this module.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of the header to obtain.
        Returns:
        The header at the requested position.

      • getHeadersCount

        public int getHeadersCount()

        Returns count of the headers in the current headers data set of this module.

        Returns:
        Headers count.

      • getHeaders

        public java.util.List<H> getHeaders()

        Returns headers data set of this module.

        Returns:
        List of headers.

      • addHeader

        protected void addHeader(H header,
             int position)

        Adds the given header at the specified position into the current headers data set of this module. If there is already header at the specified position, the current one will be replaced by the given one.

        Parameters:
        header - H to add.
        position - Position, at which should be header added.

      • removeHeader

        protected void removeHeader(int position)

        Removes header at the specified position from the current headers data set of this module.

        Parameters:
        position - Position, at which should be header removed.
